tasks.label: avl2gtfsrt-server-dev
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file dev.env --profile server up -d --build

tasks.label: avl2gtfsrt-publisher-dev
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file dev.env --profile publisher up -d --build
